item.title: Docked ‘Heavy Machinery’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Haul heavy-duty cargo with massive machines.

Saber Interactive has released a new trailer for port simulation game DOcked dubed “Heavy Machinery,” introducing the game’s eight dynamic port vehicles.

Here are the latest details:

In this latest gameplay video, you’ll meet the eight steel beasts that play a vital role in making the bustling Port Wake run like clockwork. From the ground level all the way up to the top of the stacks, you’ll take command of these massive machines, loading, unloading, moving, lifting, storing and transferring tons of cargo to bring Port Wake back to life after a devastating hurricane.

Working the docks ain’t easy, but with the right tools, you’ll get the job done!

Docked will launch with eight dynamic port vehicles: the STS (Ship-to-Shore) Crane, Reach Stacker, Straddle Carrier, Terminal Tractor, Hopper, RMG (Rail-Mounted Gantry) Crane, RTG (Rubber-Tired Gantry) Crane, and MHC (Mobile Harbor Crane). Each is expertly engineered with the raw power and precise handling needed to fulfill your contracts.

Docked will be available for for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam. A release date has yet to be announced. A demo is available for PC.

Watch the trailer below.

Heavy Machinery Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/docked-heavy-machinery-trailer

item.title: HEART of CROWN for Switch now available in the west
item.content:encoded:
The Switch version of HEART of CROWN is now available via Nintendo eShop in the west at a 10 percent-off discount price of $26.99, publisher PLAYISM and developers illuCalab. and FLIPFLOPs announced. The price will change to $29.99 on January 29.

The western release follows the game’s Japanese release on December 18, 2025. The PC version, known as HEART of CROWN Online, also left Early Access and launched via Steam on the same date worldwide.

About the Game

With the sudden death of the great emperor, you must now build your deck to enthrone the princess of your choice!

Your role is to support the princess. Get ready for this exemplary deck-building game based on a succession battle!

Expand your domain and gather powerful supporters to seize the throne!

Indie game studio illuCalab, creator of titles such as Gensou SkyDrift and A Magical High School Girl, based HEART of CROWN on the physical card game of the same name, which was produced and published by FLIPFLOPs.

Gameplay

In this four-player turn-based card game, you’ll compete to get your princess on the throne vacated by the great emperor!

To get ahead in the game, use the money from your territories to purchase even more territories and action cards.

Once you have enough resources, it’s time to back a princess!

Each princess has a powerful ability, so you’ll want to be first to pick!

Make allies of senators, dukes and other power brokers, and once you hit 20 succession points, the coronation ceremony will begin. Victory and the throne will be yours.

Steam online is supported, and ranked matches and room matches are available.

With a scenario mode as well as a host of talented voice actors, this game can be enjoyed by both single and multiple players.
​
Experience beautiful animations and interfaces in this digital incarnation of HEART of CROWN!

Story

In a wild time when swords and magic still ruled the world, an empire had united the entire continent and ended a long war. However, before the peace could be solidified, the great emperor fell ill, without a successor in place…

If this continues, we could be back to a war-torn world! You are one of the most powerful people in the empire. You must quickly establish the emperor’s throne and ensure the unity and peace of the continent. The emperor had no male children, but fortunately, he had seven candidates to succeed him, including two princesses of direct descent.

Now, let’s get the princess of your dreams to ascend to the throne!

Switch Physical Edition Now Available

The physical edition for the Nintendo Switch is also available now! Don’t miss out on limited time bonuses like the set of 8 princess hologram cards that can be used in the physical card game.

*For players in North America and Europe: The physical version is only available on the PLAYISM Official Store and will include the Japanese merchandise version but have full in-game language support.

Original Soundtrack Now Available on Steam

To celebrate the game’s full release, the original soundtrack featuring a total of 25 tracks is now available on Steam! Either grab it standalone or get it for 10 percent off with the base game plus original soundtrack bundle! The soundtrack includes selected tracks from the previous title, HEART of CROWN PC.



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/heart-of-crown-for-switch-now-available-in-the-west

item.title: Cozy farm management game Farming Camp announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

From Orange Season developer Innerfire Studios.

Publisher SOEDESCO and Orange Season developer Innerfire Studios have announced cozy farm management game Farming Camp for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC (Steam). A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via SOEDESCO:

About

Farming Camp is a cozy, single-player farm management game that follows the journey of an ambitious teenager competing to become the best farmer in the camp. Manage your farm alongside your companions, complete chores for points, and deal with the dynamics of a colorful cast in their teenage years.

  • Your Path to Farming Greatness Begins! – Step into the boots of young Alessandra, before she became the renowned Evertree Farmer. Experience her life at the Evertree Farming Camp where it all began. Learn the ropes and face the fun and chaos of camp life.
  • Team Up With a Lively Farming Crew – You’re not alone on the farm. You’ll have the company of two budding young farmers, each with their own vibe. Assign chores, solve problems, and build friendships as you figure out how to run the farm together.
  • Heart, Humor, and Harvests! – Farming’s only half the fun at Evertree Farming Camp. From delightful dramas to silly surprises, and even a few messy moments, there’s never a dull day at the camp!
  • Work Hard to Take Care of the Camp – Use the tools at your disposal and climb your way to the top as the camp’s best farming team. Coordinate with your companions and earn points by completing chores, maintaining the camp, attending classes, and tackling missions.
  • Have Fun and Win the Competition – Jump into quick and fun minigames that keep things exciting—whether it’s racing against the clock to eliminate pests, chopping wood, cooking delicious meals, and more!

Key Features

  • Embark on a cozy single-player farming adventure and follow a unique, captivating story.
  • Explore a beautifully hand-drawn 2D top-down world full of charming details.
  • Meet a diverse and lovable cast of characters, each with their own quirks, stories, and farming talents.
  • Grow a variety of crops, care for animals, fish, and make your team win the competition.
  • Keep your farm thriving with fun and engaging mini-games.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯
